title: Americans expected to set holiday spending record despite economic uncertainty
description: Despite inflation and financial instability, American consumers are projected to spend more than ever in late 2025, with average holiday budgets exceeding $1,000 per person—a 4% increase from 2024. Affluent households drive spending growth due to strong inves…
